flawed_nl_solution:
Teresa has 49 pencils because 14 + 35 = <<14+35=49>>49
Teresa gives away 39 pencils because 49 - 10 = <<49-10=39>>39
Each sibling gets 31 pencils because 39 / 3 = <<39/3=31>>31
#### 31

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 13, not 31. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
